name: Clucking Drunk
description:
Clucking Drunk is a third-person game where you have to round up all of the chickens as fast as you can while drunk off moonshine.

Created for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

Developers:

Kian - Programmer and 3D animator

Vic - 3D character and environment artist

Emily - 3D character and environment artist

Harley - Designer and 3D artist

Elliot - Programmer and designer

3rd Party Assets

  • https://opengameart.org/content/joy-ride
  • https://freesound.org/people/Rudmer_Rotteveel/sounds/316921/
  • https://opengameart.org/content/grass-foot-step-sounds-yo-frankie
  • https://www.dafont.com/somerset-barnyard.font
